text: Disney Parks, Experiences and Products (formerly Walt Disney Parks and Resorts) is part of Disney Studios Corporation. The best well-known when, Disney sold their 50% of Disneyland and Walt Disney World, Disney Consumer Products began licensing the characters of Disney such as Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck, Goofy, Pluto, Winnie the Pooh, Tigger, Snow White, Cinderella, Sheriff Woody, Buzz Lightyear, and Darth Vader among others for use in the parks. ==Disney resorts== *Disneyland Resort *Walt Disney World Resort *Tokyo Disney Resort *Disneyland Paris *Hong Kong Disneyland Resort *Shanghai Disney Resort ==References== Category:1954 establishments in the United States Category:American entertainment companies Category:Disney companies
title: Disney Parks, Experiences and Products
